ygData.subject: a few misc thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, here are some random issues- 1. i was looking at the temple/ro quests.  where is a good place to pull shadowed men from?  i know there are 5 in lavastorm,
ygData.messageBody:
ok, here are some random issues-

1. i was looking at the temple/ro quests. where is a good place to pull
shadowed men from? i know there are 5 in lavastorm, but ive been having
trouble getting enough ppl to take the camp (especially with sol calling to
them so nearby). is there a single spawn anywhere? im L25, btw, i believe
that is sufficient.

2. guards- is there somewhere to pull guards? being evil and all, i would
like to get some payback, but i got wasted looking around for something in
RV yesterday. there were three guards that werent red, and one was green.
the others were blue, but they were too close to the reds to attack- oh
well.

3. what lvls does one need to be to take on the temple quests? i read an
old post for the harvester, mentioning the writer was L35 at the time. is
25 high enough?

thats it for now!

Belphenor
